item.description:
So great to see Teresa who is having a grand fun summer and to see Ellen again who has two kids going to college and she herself will be teaching again next week - want both of you back :)

Great to see Karen who is "again" going off on vacation, but she will be back so she can skunk me :)

And Susan who "claimed" I yelled at her all night, and I keep telling her it is just my usual speech pattern when she gives Bette a chance to peg on runs all night :( :( :(

And don't I just love to beat out Bette, and as Gabe calls her "Captain Bette", at the very end....

and, of course, Gabriel quoted himself:
“ The usual catalog of victories for Signor Bragadoccio. ” even though newcomer Larry (not really any more) beat us with a grand pegging of 3 which left both Gabe and I in the dead hole :(

And they missed you Emad because I won a lot last night because you were not there :(

And those are the reasons people should come to this meet up because it is just a lot of fun and we even play cards too :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards out :)
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet Up - Welcome to September!
